titles.title: If The Lord Says I Am Righteous, Then I Am

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
If the Lord says I am righteous, then I am.
If the Lord says I am righteous, then I am.
If the Lord says I'm a light
In this world shining bright,
If the Lord says I am, then I am.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
If I Am says I am, then I am.
If I Am says I am, then I am.
I He says I'm a light, in the world shining bright,
If I Am says I am, then I am.
